verses.verse: Surely <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to those who are <S%H1249>pure<s%> in <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
But as for <S%H7272>me,<s%> my feet were <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H5186>gone.<s%> My <S%H838>steps<s%> had <S%H369>nearly<s%> <S%H8210>slipped.<s%>
For I was <S%H7065>envious<s%> of the <S%H1984>arrogant,<s%> when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For there are no <S%H2784>struggles<s%> in their <S%H4194>death,<s%> but their <S%H193>strength<s%> is <S%H1277>firm.<s%>
They are free from <S%H5999>burdens<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> neither are they <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H5973>like<s%> other <S%H120>men.<s%>
Therefore <S%H1346>pride<s%> is like a <S%H6059>chain<s%> around their <S%H2555>neck.<s%> Violence <S%H5848>covers<s%> them like a <S%H7897>garment.<s%>
Their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3318>bulge<s%> with <S%H2459>fat.<s%> Their <S%H3824>minds<s%> pass the <S%H5674>limits<s%> of <S%H4906>conceit.<s%>
They <S%H4167>scoff<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H7451>malice.<s%> In <S%H4791>arrogance,<s%> they <S%H1696>threaten<s%> <S%H6233>oppression.<s%>
They have <S%H8371>set<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> Their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Therefore their <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H1988>them,<s%> and they <S%H4680>drink<s%> up <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4392>abundance.<s%>
They <S%H559>say,<s%> "How does <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know?<s%> Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> in the Most <S%H5945>High?<s%>"
<S%H7563>Behold,<s%> these are the wicked. Being <S%H5769>always<s%> at <S%H7961>ease,<s%> they <S%H7685>increase<s%> in <S%H2428>riches.<s%>
Surely in <S%H7385>vain<s%> I have <S%H2135>cleansed<s%> my <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocence,<s%>
For all <S%H3117>day<s%> long have I been <S%H5060>plagued,<s%> and <S%H8433>punished<s%> every <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
If I had <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H3644>thus;<s%>" <S%H898>behold,<s%> I would have betrayed the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
When I <S%H2803>tried<s%> to <S%H3045>understand<s%> <S%H5999>this,<s%> it was too painful for <S%H5869>me;<s%>
Until I <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>'s <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H995>considered<s%> their latter <S%H319>end.<s%>
Surely you <S%H7896>set<s%> them in slippery <S%H2513>places.<s%> You throw them <S%H5307>down<s%> to <S%H4876>destruction.<s%>
How they are <S%H7281>suddenly<s%> <S%H8047>destroyed!<s%> They are <S%H5486>completely<s%> swept <S%H8552>away<s%> with <S%H1091>terrors.<s%>
As a <S%H2472>dream<s%> when one <S%H6974>wakes<s%> <S%H136>up,<s%> so, Lord, when you <S%H5782>awake,<s%> you will <S%H959>despise<s%> their <S%H6754>fantasies.<s%>
For my <S%H3824>soul<s%> was <S%H2556>grieved.<s%> I was <S%H8150>embittered<s%> in my <S%H3629>heart.<s%>
I was so <S%H1198>senseless<s%> and <S%H3045>ignorant.<s%> I was a brute beast before <S%H929>you.<s%>
<S%H8548>Nevertheless,<s%> I am continually with <S%H270>you.<s%> You have held my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
You will <S%H5148>guide<s%> me with your <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> me to <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
Whom do I have in <S%H8064>heaven?<s%> There is no one on <S%H776>earth<s%> whom I desire besides <S%H2654>you.<s%>
My <S%H7607>flesh<s%> and my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3615>fails,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H6697>strength<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and my <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
<S%H7369>For,<s%> behold, those who are far from you shall <S%H6>perish.<s%> You have <S%H6789>destroyed<s%> all those who are unfaithful to <S%H2181>you.<s%>

<S%H589>But<s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me to come <S%H7132>close<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%> I have <S%H7896>made<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> that I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> of all your <S%H4399>works.<s%>
